summary: This shader for ENB allows you to tweak the bloom effect in game.
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=green]Remember to read the sticky post for news and instructions.[/color][/b]

[b][color=red]Features[/color][/b]
[list]
[*]Gaussian blur with anamorphic option
[*]Inverted Gaussian blur for more dreamy scenes (star blur in the shader)
[*]Luma and Chroma settings for the bloom with two types of luma
[*]Two separate add settings for light spread and stronger glow
[/list]

[line]

[b][color=red]Future plans[/color][/b]
-Bloom radius setting with more taps.
-Different types of blur

[line]

[b][color=red]Installation[/color][/b]
-Have your ENB working, with a profile or not.
-Backup enbbloom.fx in your main skyrim folder
-Copy my enbbloom.fx to the main skyrim folder
-Edit enbbloom.fx to change #defines and read some setting explanations
-Use shift+enter in game to toy with settings
author: Soulwynd
